A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointment of the year - poorly paced with undeveloped characters despite a long running time. There was no clear story due to several stories running in parallel. The comedy undermined the action\, of which there's plenty but rarely engaging. Benicio del Toro was the most interesting character when but came and went all too quickly. Ultimately\, there was a much better story to be told and I came out of the screening with little interest in seeing the next one.
